original_text: And Amram took him Jochebed his father's sister to wife; and she bare him Aaron and Moses: and the years of the life of Amram were an hundred and thirty and seven years.
korean_text: 아므람은 그들의 아버지의 누이 요게벳을 아내로 맞이하였고 그는 아론과 모세를 낳았으며 아므람의 나이는 백삼십칠 세였으며

sentences.original_text: and she bare him Aaron and Moses
and the years of the life of Amram
were an hundred and thirty and seven years
